description:
Attorneys Brett Davis, Tracey George and Ben Mook are the brilliant legal minds behind the Kansas City law firm of Davis George Mook LLC. As partners in the highly respected firm, the attorneys, who have more than 55 years of combined experience, work together to assist clients from Jackson, Cass, Clay and other counties across Missouri and Kansas who face legal challenges related to the following:

  • Personal injury, including motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, trucking accidents, nursing home neglect and abuse, and premises and product liability
  • Employment and labor law, including wage-and-hour claims, employee misclassification, unpaid overtime, retaliation, discrimination, harassment, and hostile work environment claims
  • Consumer rights, including failure to render services, loan fraud and deceptive advertising

If you live in Kansas City or the surrounding areas in Kansas or Missouri, you can turn to the experienced attorneys at the law firm of Davis George Mook LLC for advice and representation. The firm's attorneys are skilled negotiators and formidable litigators, and they will fight diligently for justice for you. If you would like to discuss your situation with one of the firm's lawyers, you can do so by scheduling a consultation at the firm's conveniently located Kansas City law office.
